name: h3
description: The 2025 Marucci Asura Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for peak performance and a superior feel with its innovative Gap Sync Barrel Technology, which maximizes inner barrel displacement and optimizes feel across all bat lengths and weights. The EVolve Composite Technology enhances barrel responsiveness through a composite structure with a progressively increasing fiber angle, offering a tailored fit for athletes of all ages and swing speeds. The PFX Composite Handle adjusts flex characteristics by weight drop to boost swing speed, power, and feel, while the patented OLS Connection ensures a vibration-free, smooth swing by connecting the barrel to the handle from the outside in. The bat also features a TFX Endcap for increased forgiveness, an updated knob design for improved comfort, and an enhanced soft-touch grip for superior control, making it a game-changer for fastpitch softball players. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on ALL Orders
Certification: USSSA 1.20, ISA, WBSC, NSA, & USA Softball (ASA)
Gap Sync Barrel Tech: Increases performance & optimizes feel
Mid-Loaded Barrel: Effortless power without sacrificing swing speed
EVolve Composite: Maximizes performance & barrel responsiveness
PFX Composite Handle: Enhances swing speed, power & feel
Outer-Locking System (OLS): Reduces vibration on contact and enhances stiffness
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap for more barrel flex for increased forgiveness
Enhanced Soft-Touch Grip: For a comfortable swing & extra control
